text.title: Community structure around six presidential candiates for Serbian elections
text.intro: I searched Twitter for retweets or replies to for 6 presidential candidates for Serbian elections (Sasa Jankovic, Aleksandar Vucic, Luka Maksimovic, Bosko Obradovic, Vojislav Seselj, Sasa Radulovic). The network consists of 14 591 edges and 6058 nodes. Nodes are sized based on weighted indegree, and colored based on modularity class. Edges are excluded to increase visibility of the graph.
